Windlord:

"Do you heard that, Rodimus?" said Windlord by commlink "It might be 
the cure but it seems to be a bit... explosive. What can we do? at 
whom should we inform?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> Cam::
> 
> She sobbed a little and then dried her optics. "Ok then. i'l talk 
to 
> him."  She looked at the screen. "Hi there. I'm Cam. Nice to meet 
> you."  She looked up at Windlord and hoped she was doing the right 
> thing. "My mommy told me not to give the cubes out. Sure they can 
> make a bot feel better when they are sick, but they also go boom 
> really big. I don't want them to go boom. My mommy told me never 
give 
> them to anyone because they can...uh how'd mommy and daddy put 
> it.....uh..hmm.. Oh yeah, they can make a small little genayde and 
> make the little boom be as big as a huge Warf head. I was told it 
can 
> make the boom so big it can make a whole base become trash."
